page.title: 02Manor farm Wood farm Shipton
page.content: This area is mainly agricultural,most of the farms are arable.Fifty years ago there would have been more dairy than arable.Intensive animal farming has left more land for crops.Machinery has changed farming.Fifty years ago there would have been one tractor for the whole village. Now there are 5-10 tractors on each farm.Autumn is now the busiest time of the year because farmers harvest and sow at the same time.{Manor farm}is a dairy and arable farm it has 125 ha, we grow wheat, barley,grass,sugar beet.Some parts of the land are heavy and some parts of the land are light.We get 50 tonnies a hectare of sugar beet 7 tonnies a hectare of wheat and 7 tonnies a hectare of barley.We have 20, 2 year old heifers. We have 40 calves and 50 cows.The cows get milked twice a day it takes 2 to 3 minutes to milk a cow.
